definition: body covering of a living animal, strip the skin off
details:
noun
- body covering of a living animal
= synonyms: hide
- an outer surface (usually thin)
= example: an outer surface (usually thin)
- a bag serving as a container for liquids
- a natural protective body covering and site of the sense of touch
= example: a natural protective body covering and site of the sense of touch
= synonyms: tegument, cutis
- the rind of a fruit or vegetable
= synonyms: peel
- a person's body, regarded as their life
= example: a person's body, regarded as their life
verb
- strip the skin off
= synonyms: peel, pare, flay
- remove the bark of a tree
= synonyms: bark
- bruise, cut, or injure the skin or the surface of
= example: bruise, cut, or injure the skin or the surface of
= synonyms: scrape
- climb awkwardly, as if by scrambling
= synonyms: clamber
